name: places/ChIJEfk-GgZZwokRy7jkXN9KtTE
formattedAddress: 201 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA
adrFormatAddress: 201 E 33rd St, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain selling clever arrangements & gift baskets made up of fresh & chocolate-dipped fruit.

originalText.text: I placed an order at this location online and something went wrong and it went through twice. I immediately called and they cancelled one. My order was delivered promptly the next day and it was perfect! I added the dark chocolate cupcakes for a birthday and was told they were delicious! Thank you!

text.text: I placed an order at this location online and something went wrong and it went through twice. I immediately called and they cancelled one. My order was delivered promptly the next day and it was perfect! I added the dark chocolate cupcakes for a birthday and was told they were delicious! Thank you!

originalText.text:
Changed rating as I was contacted to have the purchase re-delivered. Customer service was very friendly and as accommodating as possible on a busy day of the year.

DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY ONLINE!
I should have looked at the reviews before ordering. The online service is misleading, as if the delivery is coming from this store. I also never received a confirmation email or an order number, yet the funds have already been withdrawn from my account. I cannot track the order or even get information with out the order number. A complaint is also being filed with the BBB and FCC for not answering a phone all day.

originalText.text: Worst order experience. I have rarely rated anyone before but this truly demanded me speaking out and saving others from this horrible place. The lady on phone was extremely unprofessional and hung up without listening to my situation. False deadlines are provided and then they completely don't care about meeting or coming even close to it.

text.text: Worst order experience. I have rarely rated anyone before but this truly demanded me speaking out and saving others from this horrible place. The lady on phone was extremely unprofessional and hung up without listening to my situation. False deadlines are provided and then they completely don't care about meeting or coming even close to it.

originalText.text: This Company is the absolute worst. I ordered a large birthday bundle w /fruit, balloons and flowers for my wife bday to be delivered to her job . The order didn’t arrive until 4pm, one hour before the end of the work day. They only delivered the fruit. No flowers and no balloons. I’m on a 20 min hold as I write this message, trying to get a partial refund. No apologies, no sorry, no explanation. They just said hold on well we call the store. Good luck guys. Order at your own risk!

The order didn’t arrive until 4pm, one hour before the end of the work day. They only delivered the fruit. No flowers and no balloons. I’m on a 20 min hold as I write this message, trying to get a partial refund. No apologies, no sorry, no explanation. They just said hold on well we call the store. Good luck guys. Order at your own risk!

originalText.text:
I ordered from this place for a friend's birthday recently. They happened to live really close to the store and so I took a chance on the same day delivery hoping nothing would go wrong in spite of the low star reviews.

I should have never taken that chance. I regret purchasing from the store because my order was never fulfilled. Whoever delivered the package most likely stole the arrangement and had sent me an email confirmation of the delivery with a picture of some random person's room, not my friend's apartment.

I had emailed edible arrangments of my case and had called (twice!) about a refund and they had promised a full refund. They told me the refund would take up to 21 days and so I waited but never received a refund.

It's been approx. 3 months since and I never received my refund. Edible Arrangements has stolen my money. I warn others never to order from this company or they will rob you of your money too.
